name: tm84
effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.
